item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:99 Chances: Lyft’s estimated fair value is US$35.37 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures The market rally is broadening out beyond mega-cap technology stocks, and companies that cover a broad swath of the economy are starting to see their stocks join the rally in equities Risks: Lyft shares more than doubled over the last year, but the stock underperformed when compared with Uber Uber and Lyft announced they will cease operations in Minneapolis, sparking significant controversy for rideshare users The company’s liquidity position raises major concerns Score:99 chances characters count - risks characters count = 99
